stories.text:
~~ Satellite Engineering ~~

SpaceX has built the largest satellite constellation, Starlink, in the world with a goal to provide high speed internet to the over 3 billion people on the planet who don't have access to internet. We have been proud to be the main internet provider for the people of Ukraine right now, as well as bringing swift support to countries dealing with natural disasters like Tonga and Australia.

Location: Redmond, WA; Hawthorne, CA Software Engineer (Satellites): https://grnh.se/ce9a58eb2us

Location: Mountain View, CA Software Engineer (Starlink Wireless Control Plane): https://grnh.se/bc4200ea2us

Location: Mountain View, CA; Redmond, WA Sr. Software Engineer (Starlink IP & Routing): https://grnh.se/f063892f2us

Location: Redmond, WA Site Reliability Engineer: https://grnh.se/391163be2us

Location: Redmond, WA Date Engineer (Starlink Customer Experience): https://grnh.se/b2a713ee2us

SpaceX | On-site LA, Bay Area, Seattle, Austin, Washington DC, Starbase | Full Time | Software & Security Engineering

~~Vehicle Engineering~~

SpaceX engineers support the development of reusable rockets, spaceships & satellites!

Location: All locations Security Engineer, Components: https://grnh.se/4eecccfe2us

Location: Hawthorne, CA Software Engineer, Components: https://grnh.se/d5fd54f62us
